channel.title: Where do i add the command?

item.title: Where do i add the command?
item.dc:creator: @phantom_ice phantom ice
item.description:
@phantom_ice wrote:

ok :mad:

idk where to add the new commands because when i add a new command under another, nothing happens… its a error.

Example…

if (command.startsWith("white") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(6633, 1); addItem(6629, 1); addItem(6625, 1); addItem(6623, 1); addItem(6619, 1); addItem(6617, 1); addItem(6611, 1); addItem(0773, 1); addItem(1048, 1); }

Where do i put the code under it? please help

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i add the command?
